name: Bewildebots
detailed_description:
Take to the stars and feed your brain with the unique puzzles of Bewildebots. Take command of up to 10 robots at once, guiding each to their own teleporter for deployment across the universe.

Bewildebots is a challenging puzzle game that requires you to send commands to up to 10 robots at once. Every robot will move at the same time, interpreting your commands based on the direction they face independently.

Explore the universe and you will find:
- 300 handcrafted puzzles across 3 grid sizes
- 5 chapters, each with brain-frying new mechanics
- Cross platform progression! Sync your progress between your desktop and mobile devices!
- Simple and intuitive keyboard controls let you focus on the puzzles!
- Controller support
- Fully playable offline
